short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension to force custom CCS files!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Want your facebook to look Organge? Your amazon to look grreen? If you ever want to write custom CSS that gets loaded to overwrite the default styles of websites, then this is for you!

Simply click on the Extensions Popup menu item and start writing css! 

Hit save to push changes to all open tabs.

No information is collected for anything.
